bibl.title: The Documentary Evidence for Ancient Mime.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Toronto. Summary in DA 57 (1996-1997) p. 1604-A. - Examines all the documentary evidence (i.e., inscriptions and non-literary papyri).
bibl.seg: MAXWELL Robert LeGrand, The Documentary Evidence for Ancient Mime.
